body: The plan is to revert `Tensor` and to use shapes as `long[]` again in `Constant`. But I would keep the new scalar factories in `Constant` though (e.g. `ops.constant(1.0f)`)
body_html: The plan is to revert Tensor and to use shapes as long[] again in Constant. But I would keep the new scalar factories in Constant though (e.g. ops.constant(1.0f))
body_text: The plan is to revert Tensor and to use shapes as long[] again in Constant. But I would keep the new scalar factories in Constant though (e.g. ops.constant(1.0f))
